description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Plat Master is a platformer in which you, the player, create your own platforms to complete the level. There are 50 challenging floors for you to climb.
description.short: The Plat Master is a platformer in which you, the player, create your own platforms to complete the level. There are 50 challenging floors for you to climb.
